data.text:
@Shalini07212788 @akshtanilabh @Aaaru_Prem Bilkul sahi kaha aapne shalini ji. Aur Apne Bete Betiyon ki counselling ke Saath Hum sabko Bhi united hone ki zaroorat hai. 

Hindu + Sanataniyon ko ab kewal EKTA hi bacha sakti h.

Caste, Status sab Bhul kar Sare Hinduon ko United hone ki Zaroorat h.

@cchukudebelu It’s crazy how unaware and insulated Nigerians are from racial politics in America, and how Africans are wrongly viewed as bottom caste by Americans within that context. Sheesh! He basically said that innocent Nigerians are shit, and then banned them from emigrating.

data.text: I don’t care if you clean toilets for a living or you’re the Dalai Lama (which is kind of the same thing, if you think about it), this whole caste system of us up here & them down there has to end.

I bet the "Loser" will cry:  "People are saying that boat-loads of Chinese are coming in to illegally vote!  Everyone is saying that Canada is stealing ballots caste for him & robbing him & Germans & French are hacking the votes so that it is rigged!  Must nullify the Election!"
